com.facebook.buck.android

Class GenStringSourceMapStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.step.AbstractExecutionStep
      • com.facebook.buck.android.GenStringSourceMapStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step

    public class GenStringSourceMapStep
extends AbstractExecutionStep
    This class implements a Buck build step that will generate a JSON file with the following info for each <string>, <plurals> and <string-array> resource found in the strings.xml files for each resource directory: 

     android_resource_name : {
   androidResourceId,
   stringsXmlPath
 }

    where:

    • androidResourceId is the integer value, assigned by aapt, extracted from R.txt
    • stringsXmlPath is the path to the first strings.xml file where this string resource was found.

    Example: 

     {
   "strings": {
     "thread_list_new_message_button": {
       "androidResourceId":"0x7f0800e6",
       "stringsXmlPath":"android_res/com/facebook/messaging/res/values/strings.xml"
     },
     "bug_report_category_lock_screen": {
       "androidResourceId":"0x7f080489",
       "stringsXmlPath":"android_res/com/facebook/bugreporter/res/values/strings.xml"
     }
   },
   "plurals": {
     "like_count": {
       "androidResourceId": "0x7f080480",
       "stringsXmlPath":"android_res/com/facebook/likes/res/values/strings.xml"
     }
   },
   "string-arrays": {
     "share_types": {
       "androidResourceId": "0x7f080470",
       "stringsXmlPath":"android_res/com/facebook/share/res/values/strings.xml"
     }
   }
 }

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenStringSourceMapStep(ProjectFilesystem filesystem, Path rDotTxtDir, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Path> resDirectories, Path destinationPath)
      Associates each string resource with it's integer id (as assigned by aapt during GenRDotTxtUtil) and it's originating strings.xml file (path).

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenStringSourceMapStep

        public GenStringSourceMapStep(ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
                              Path rDotTxtDir,
                              com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Path> resDirectories,
                              Path destinationPath)
        Associates each string resource with it's integer id (as assigned by aapt during GenRDotTxtUtil) and it's originating strings.xml file (path).
        Parameters:
        rDotTxtDir - Directory where R.txt is found
        resDirectories - Directories of resource files. This the same list, with same ordering that was provided to aapt during GenRDotTxtUtil.
        destinationPath - Directory where where strings.json is written to.
